header.homePageContent: This is the content of the home page.
header.appDescription: A great application with Next.js and i18n

metadata.title: Tim Niederer // Freelancing
metadata.description: Software development with a focus on web and mobile development.

openGraph.title: Tim Niederer // Freelancing
openGraph.description: Software development with a focus on web and mobile development.

home.offerDescription: The areas where I have gained the most experience are web and mobile development. I was also usually involved in the design. However, I am also quick and happy to learn new technologies/platforms.
home.webDescription: Development for desktop and mobile - preferably with React / NextJS & NestJS.
home.mobileDescription: Cross-platform development for iOS & Android - preferably with Flutter
home.otherDescription: C & ESP32, C# & Unity, Java Swing/FX, ...
home.butDescription: The technology is secondary to me. I prefer to work on projects that I can/want to use myself. My own interest in the product makes it easiest for me to develop good solutions.
home.resumeDescription: Here is my career path so far. Most of the projects I have worked on are only partially public and were usually under an NDA. Therefore, I will only refer to my work very superficially here.

experience.title: My Experience
experience.description: In my 8 years in computer science, I have already had contact with most major technologies. I was mostly active in the frontend, but I also enjoy working on backend or hardware projects. In the last 5 years, I was primarily active in the following technologies:

commits.hobby2017: The journey began with hobby projects in Java. First small CLI tools and later many 2D games with Java Swing
commits.thu2018: Studies at Ulm University of Applied Sciences (THU)
commits.zwick2018: In-depth practice at Zwick/Roell in combination with studies
commits.einstein2020: Joined the Driverless team at Einstein Motorsport for the initial development of an autonomous system
commits.einstein2022: End of membership at Einstein Motorsport
commits.zwick2022: Transition to software developer in the central development at ZwickRoell
commits.zwick2023: End of employment at ZwickRoell and full transition to self-employment
commits.weichwaren2023: Change from Weichwarenprojekt GbR to Weichwarenprojekt GmbH
